The plane flying from Hurghada to Nizhny Novgorod urgently landed in Kazan is informed about this by Rambler

The Onur Air airline, operating a flight from Hurghada to Nizhny Novgorod, made an emergency landing at Kazan airport due to weather conditions at Strigino airport. The Transport Prosecutor\'s office is checking the circumstances, according to the Telegram channel of the Volga Transport Prosecutor\'s Office. This is reported by Rambler.
